easily the best singleplayer survival game ever made  the only let down is that you cant play with friends  its a survival exploration game with a heaping helping of horror elements ranging from the dark depths to absolutely terrifying monstrosities that youll never forget even years after playing  i would challenge you to play from start to end its worth it
beautifully immersive it can be a little frustrating to unlock the blueprints but its a solid survival experience and progress feels rewarding highly recommended

the update has messed up my vr setup but at least the allow rolling back to a working version  the game is probably the most immersive game ive played in vr there is so much life going around and the various vehicle types are a lot of fun
